briefdescription.para: Updates the scene every frame (Animation/booleans/music etc)
Renders skybox with rotation and scaling done.

parameterdescription.para: Scale of the mesh to render
and z Position of the mesh to render
and rz Rotation of mesh to render
Passes in the text file to be pushed into array

memberdef.argsstring: (Mesh *mesh, float size, float x, float y, float z)

briefdescription.para: Initialize other class objects, meshes to render, booleans, floats and strings.
